column1: An objection has been taken to the maintainability of this writ application to
the  effect  that  the  prayer  is  quite  vague
particular duty that is owned to the petitioner.

column2: Mr. Nagitha Wijesekara after having consulted his client brings to the notice
of Court that he would in the circumstances withdraw this application.
He also states to the Court that he be permitted to file a fresh application.
